content:
Greetings everyone!
Since the file format for genomics data MPEG-G will be released soon, we were asking ourselves how this kind of files could be embedded in FHIR. Our first thought was the Resource Media, which according to the Trial-Use Note, should be able to handle more than just audio, image and video files.
"Observations that require the attachment data types are represented by the Media resource instead of Observation."
Am I right with this assumption?
Thank you in advance!
